name: Spacemaze (BenCze)
description:
Escape from the maze!

Collect as many dandelion seeds as you can and get them safe outside of the city gate. (Look for the tallest building). You will need energy from the yellow flowers' powder.  Watch out for the growing city around you!

Move with WASD (or arrow keys) + you can pause the game with Esc or P.

Spacemaze is our first project with the early acces Unreal Engine 5. The game is made for Epic MegaJam 2021.

Created by Bence Czanik (tech artist), Csilla Szegedi (UI and prop artist), Gábor Szatmári (character artist)
